title: As a user I want to be able to run the Deferred Comp Funding Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Deferred Comp Funding" is an option in the Report Listing widget with a Category of Payroll
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the Deferred Comp Funding report
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow the user to set the prompts according to the documentation
AND clubs should ONLY be able to select their own Org
AND the data displayed in the Deferred Comp Funding report should equal the data generated by the Deferred Comp Utility when the same criteria are entered
AND the report and layout should match the specifications
AND a new permission group to control the visibility of this report should be created and added to the existing admin-xxx-all user ids

title: As a user I want to run the Multi-Year Report - Player Details report
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Multi-Year Report - Player Details" is a report in the Report listing widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects this report from the widget
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch the prompts according to the requirements (including those delivered in prior stories)
AND entering the desired prompts and running the report should work and match the requirements
AND the report should have an LDAP associated with it

title: As a user I want to run the CBT Assessment Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Competitive Balance Tax Assessment' report from the widget 
AND enters desired prompts
custom_expected: THEN the report will load with the entered prompts in separate tab.

title: As a user I want to run the CBT/ LRD Payroll Player Details Reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Payrolls - Player Details' report from the listing widget 
AND selects "CB" or "LRD" from Payroll Type drop down
AND click OK
custom_expected:
THEN 
"C.B. Tax Payrolls - Player Details" or "LRD 40-Man Payrolls - Player Details" report will be launched depending on the selection. Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.

title: As a user I want to run the CBT/ LRD Payroll Team Details Reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Payrolls - Team Details' report from the listing widget 
AND selects "CB" or "LRD" from Payroll Type drop down
AND click OK
custom_expected:
THEN 
"C.B. Tax Payrolls - Team Details" or "LRD 40-Man Payrolls - Team Details" report will launch depending on what was selected. Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.

title: As a user, I want to run the Payroll Player Details Report Straight to Excel
custom_preconds: GIVEN  EBIS1 "Run Excel Report" version of the player details report has been replicated in EBIS2
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to reports widget
custom_expected:
THEN the popup to run the Payroll - Player Details report should have a "Run Excel" button which generates this document
AND  columns and layout of the printed excel report will match ebis1

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Assignment Bonus report
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Report listing widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Assignment Bonus" report should be listed. 
AND Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Capitalized Payments by Year report
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Report listing widget
custom_expected:

AND Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.
